markdownRemark.html:
The site you're on.

I built this site to tinker with designing without a UI framework (so you can expect it to evolve over time). I also learned how to use gatsby to develop React-based static sites, which I'm using now for some quick fun projects at work and for family.

Here's my list of issues for this site:

  • Convert all functions to arrow notation
  • Settle on a color scheme
  • Make the 'Work' page responsive
  • Add some more interactive features to learn new CSS featuers.
